overview:
Yusuke Ito is the Co-Founder and Lead Design Engineer of Musavy, which he started with Co-Founders, Masaaki Nakatsu and Takenori Sato in March 2011.

He leads all design fields in Musavy, building expertise in User Interface, Logo Design, and front-end programming. He loves design with simplicity and deep user engagement.

He graduated from Nagano National College of Technology. Also, he won the 3rd winner of World Robocup 2009 in Austria.

Previously, he was the leading software designer and engineer of LINDOC, a digital publishing start-up in Japan, also freelance, releasing TweetParakeet, a twitter client app for iPad, and SimpleCamera, customized camera app for iPhone.
